title: Most played PC games 2015
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Video Game, and Share of playing time in each Video Game on the y axis.
The Share of playing time is highest at Video Game League of Legends and lowest at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III.
The lowest value at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III is 31.83x times less than the highest value at League of Legends.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Video Game in the x axis and Share of playing time in the y axis.
The Share of playing time is highest at Video Game League of Legends and lowest at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Video Game, and Share of playing time in each Video Game on the y axis.
The Share of playing time is highest at Video Game League of Legends and lowest at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III.
The lowest value at Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III is 31.83x times less than the highest value at League of Legends.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Video Game, and Share of playing time in each Video Game on the y axis.
The maximum Share of playing time 22.92 is found at Video Game League of Legends and the minimum is found at Call of Duty: Black Ops III where Video Game is 0.72.
The highest Video Game League of Legends has 22.2 more Share of playing time than the lowest Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III.

The Video Game League of Legends has the highest Share of playing time, followed by Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, and Fallout 4. Down to the Video Game Call of Duty: Black Ops III which is the lowest.
The Video Game League of Legends has 7.0 times more Share of playing time than average.
Summing up the values of all Video Games, we get total 65.46.

data.Video Game: Call of Duty: Black Ops III
